Player History
Drafted in 3rd round, 59th overall pick, by Syracuse in 1970...
Injured on 6/8/1972 with a Inflamed Abdominal Muscle, out for one week...
Had first career hit on 4/16/1978, off Eric Shortridge (PIL)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/8/1978, off Andrew Hastings (TRO)...
Traded from Syracuse to Plum Grove on 2/5/1979 (Going to SYR: CF C. Sanford, P J. Skeen. Going to PG: SS R. Merz)...
Traded from Plum Grove to New Jersey on 7/24/1982 (Going to NJ: SS R. Merz, 1B S. Knuth. Going to PG: P D. Whisman)...
Signed as a free agent by Plum Grove on 2/2/1984 to a 3-year deal worth $729,600 per year...
Signed as a free agent by Halifax on 2/17/1987 to a 5-year deal worth $793,500 per year...
